name: Durka Simulator (Crucial Experiment)
description: Welcome to the new universe, comrade! Have you ever thought that one day the orderlies will want to take over our planet? Of course not, but Mickey had to feel it for himself. Together with the Mysterious One, they are trying to stop the armed invasion of orderlies from another universe. You, as one of the employees of the highest privileges, should help them in this situation. Your goal is to find all the infinity stones, neutralize the invasion and take the stones with you to the ship. We are sure that you will cope with this task, so good luck, comrade!
